Package MOBLIMA.configurables

Class peakPricing

java.lang.Object
MOBLIMA.configurables.peakPricing
public class peakPricing extends Object
Helper class to provide configurable extra chargers for different preferences.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    peakPricing()
    Creates a PeakPricing and populate it with data from the peak pricing database.
